languages.text: "Нет, Домин'{name}. Ты долж{mf|ен|на} остаться. Немезит бросил вызов именно тебе, и те, на кого мы охотимся, точно знают тебя в лицо. Ты спугнешь добычу, и мы потеряем след до очередной трагедии". {n}Немигающий взгляд Кибеллы встречается с вашим.{/n}

"No, Domin'{name}. You must stay. You are the one that Nemesite has challenged, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will frighten away the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy occurs." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нет, Домин'{name}. Ты долж{mf|ен|на} остаться. Немезит бросил вызов именно тебе, и те, на кого мы охотимся, точно знают тебя в лицо. Ты спугнешь добычу, и мы потеряем след до очередной трагедии". {n}Немигающий взгляд Кибеллы встречается с вашим.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "No, Enim'{name}. You must stay. You are the one challenged by Nemesite, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will spook the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}

"No, Enim'{name}. You must stay. You are the one challenged by Nemesite, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will spook the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}

"No, Enim'{name}, you must stay. You are the one that Nemesite has challenged, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will spook the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy occurs." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}

"No, Enim'{name}, you must stay. You are the one that Nemesite has challenged, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will spook the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy occurs." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}

"No, Domin'{name}. You must stay. You are the one that Nemesite has challenged, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will frighten away the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy occurs." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}

"No, Domin'{name}. You must stay. You are the one that Nemesite has challenged, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will frighten away the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy occurs." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}

languages.text: "Nein, Domin'{name}. Ihr müsst bleiben. Nemesit hat Euch herausgefordert, und unsere Jagdbeute weiß, wie Ihr ausseht. Ihr würdet die Beute verschrecken, wir verlieren die Fährte, und schon ereignet sich die nächste Tragödie." {n}Kibellah richtet ihren starren Blick auf dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, Domin'{name}. You must stay. You are the one that Nemesite has challenged, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will frighten away the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy occurs." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Domin'{name}. Ihr müsst bleiben. Nemesit hat Euch herausgefordert, und unsere Jagdbeute weiß, wie Ihr ausseht. Ihr würdet die Beute verschrecken, wir verlieren die Fährte, und schon ereignet sich die nächste Tragödie." {n}Kibellah richtet ihren starren Blick auf dich.{/n}

languages.text: «No, Domin'{name}. Usted debe quedarse. Nemesitio le ha retado expresamente, y aquellos a los que damos caza reconocerían su rostro. Espantaría a la presa y perderíamos el rastro hasta que sobreviniera otra tragedia». {n}Kibellah te mira fijamente a los ojos, sin pestañear.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, Domin'{name}. You must stay. You are the one that Nemesite has challenged, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will frighten away the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy occurs." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No, Domin'{name}. Usted debe quedarse. Nemesitio le ha retado expresamente, y aquellos a los que damos caza reconocerían su rostro. Espantaría a la presa y perderíamos el rastro hasta que sobreviniera otra tragedia». {n}Kibellah te mira fijamente a los ojos, sin pestañear.{/n}

languages.text: 「ダメよ、ドミン・{name}。あなたは残って。あなたはネメサイトが挑んできた者であり、狩る者たちはあなたを一目で分かる。獲物は怖気付いて足取りを見失い、次の悲劇が起こることになるでしょう」{n}キベラは、まばたきもせずこちらを見つめ、視線がぶつかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, Domin'{name}. You must stay. You are the one that Nemesite has challenged, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will frighten away the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy occurs." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ダメよ、エニム・{name}。あなたは残って。あなたはネメサイトが挑んできた者であり、狩る者たちはあなたを一目で分かる。獲物は怖気付いて足取りを見失い、次の悲劇が起こることになるでしょう」{n}キベラは、まばたきもせずこちらを見つめ、視線がぶつかった。{/n}

languages.text: “不行，秘者{name}，你必须留在这里。你是涅墨斯特的对手，我们的敌人一眼就能认出你。如果你参加追击，就会吓跑猎物。我们会失去他们的踪迹，悲剧会再度发生。”{n}绮贝菈目不转睛，注视着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, Domin'{name}. You must stay. You are the one that Nemesite has challenged, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will frighten away the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy occurs." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不行，秘者{name}，你必须留在这里。你是涅墨斯特的对手，我们的敌人一眼就能认出你。如果你参加追击，就会吓跑猎物。我们会失去他们的踪迹，悲剧会再度发生。”{n}绮贝菈目不转睛，注视着你。{/n}

languages.text: « Non, Domin'{name}. Vous devez rester. C'est vous que Némésite a {mf|défié|défiée} et ceux que nous pourchassons vous connaissent de vue. Vous allez effrayer la proie et nous perdrons sa piste jusqu'à la prochaine tragédie. » {n}Kibellah vous fixe sans ciller.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, Domin'{name}. You must stay. You are the one that Nemesite has challenged, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will frighten away the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy occurs." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Non, Domin'{name}. Vous devez rester. C'est vous que Némésite a {mf|défié|défiée} et ceux que nous pourchassons vous connaissent de vue. Vous allez effrayer la proie et nous perdrons sa piste jusqu'à la prochaine tragédie. » {n}Kibellah vous fixe sans ciller.{/n}

languages.text: "Hayır Domin'{name}. Sen burada kalmalısın. Nemezit'in meydan okuduğu sensin. Avladıklarımız ise neye benzediğini biliyor. Avımızı korkutup kaçıracaksın ve bir sonraki trajedi yaşanana dek izi kaybedeceğiz." {n}Kibellah'nın cesur bakışları, seninkilerle buluşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, Domin'{name}. You must stay. You are the one that Nemesite has challenged, and those we hunt know you by sight. You will frighten away the prey, and we will lose the trail until the next tragedy occurs." {n}Kibellah's unblinking gaze meets your own.{/n}
